sub_title: Technical Lead Backup & Recovery | Sr. Technical Consultant at SJ-Solutions
summary:
My name is Jos Meijer, I live in Dronten and I am Technical Lead Backup & Recovery & Sr. Technical Consultant..
Being of added value is what gives me motivation and energy.

I have the natural ability to look beyond the pre-defined scope which is in front of me.
Create a high overview, identify relationships and understand what is happening.
Observe possibilities and provide (solicited and unsolicited) advice on improvements and risks.
Within a realistic scope where the interests and trust of both the client and the employer are ensured.

To be able to do this, I have strong analytical skills and I also am social and communicative.
I am not in favor of thinking in boxes, everyone should be given the opportunity to show their qualities.
Initiative must be taken, as well as the associated responsibility.

My technical focus area is Commvault, with the addition of virtualization and storage solutions.
I am experienced with consultancy, creating and implementing designs and performing R&D.

Experienced in addressing groups, for training purposes as well as giving presentations.
I had the opportunity to give presentations at employers, clients and during organized events.
For example at an event of SJ-Solutions in the AFAS Theater (Leusden) and at Commvault Connections Live in Hotel Okura (Amsterdam).

profile_positions.description:
Technical lead for Backup & Recovery across all labels within the group.
Developing, implementing, improving and innovating the Backup & Recovery solutions.
Sparring partner for the group CTO, partners and customers regarding complex backup & recovery issues.
Training and educating team members.

profile_positions.description:
Process owner regarding Data Management (Commvault).

Responsible for R&D, designing and implementing complex backup/archiving solutions based on PoP and PaaS constructions.

Backend engineer

Responsible for maintenance and implementation within the CAM Cube for own customer set, focus on Data Management (Commvault), Storage Tiering (Netapp), Server Virtualisatie (VMware), Datacenter Infrastructuur en Server Management (Windows 2008 & 2012).

Other responsibilities are:
- Running standby shifts
- Management & responsibility for VOIP environment
profile_positions.title: Engineer (Data Management)

profile_positions.description:
Delivering support regarding the Cam Cube platform, main focus on Data Management (Commvault), Storage Tiering (Netapp, Quantum), Server Virtualisatie (VMware) en Server Management (Windows 2008 & 2012).

Running standby shifts for engineering and performing R&D regarding Commvault.

Other responsibilities:
- My own customers, managing and maintaining customer satisfaction.
- Maintaining growth, development and processes within Platform Support, supporting colleagues with the support proces and providing knowledge regarding a diversity of platform components.
profile_positions.title: Platform Support Service Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Disaster Recovery specialist, Ensuring IT Continuity during calamities. Testing Disaster Recovery scenario's by restoring data to physical or virtual environments using the customers backup environment, these consist of a variation of backup solutions. Additionally troubleshooting restored environments to achieve an environment equal to production.
Commvault specialist, implement and manage backup environments.
